# Install Packages
```{r}
# Install packages
install.packages(c("tidyverse",
                   "pastecs"))
```

```{r}
# Install packages from GitHub
remotes::install_github("easystats/easystats")
```

# Load Packages
```{r}
# Load Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
library(pastecs)
```

# Load Data
```{r}
# Load data
df <- read_csv("data/marketing.csv")
```

```{r}
# Print/Show the data
print(df)
```

# Descriptive Statistics

```{r}
# Descriptive Statistics from base
summary(df)
```

```{r}
# Descriptive Statistics from pastecs
stat.desc(df)
```

```{r}
# Get Statistical Report
report(df)
```

# Correlation

```{r}
# Pearson Correlation
correlation(df)
```
